sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.AgileMessages</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>AgileMessages</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var AgileMessages = Class.create();
AgileMessages.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
        this.messages = {
            rank_is_out_of_limit: gs.getMessage("Rank is more than max available number"),
            unable_to_perform_ranking_operation: gs.getMessage("Unable to perform ranking operation"),
            range_block_out_of_limit: gs.getMessage("Ranking range block is out of limit"),
            invalid_input: gs.getMessage("Invalid input")
        };
    },

    get: function(key) {
        if(JSUtil.notNil(this.messages[key]))
            return this.messages[key];
        return key;
    },

    type: 'AgileMessages'
};

]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2017-05-09 23:00:39</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>1464604f9f223200598a5bb0657fcfd2</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>AgileMessages</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Agile Development 2.0" source="com.snc.sdlc.agile.2.0">c2159f242fc10110d8a4d5f62799b627</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_1464604f9f223200598a5bb0657fcfd2</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2017-05-09 23:00:39</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>650</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
